metadata.title: CVE-2022-32308 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Cross Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in uBlock Origin extension before1.41.1 allows remote attackers to run arbitrary code via a spoofed'MessageSender.url' to the browser renderer process.

criterions.comment: ublock-origin: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
